title: Seven more stations
creator_credit: Victor Sheridan, Patrick Henry and Academy Picture Corporation
brief_description: A record of the opening of the Eastern Extension of London Transport’s Central line from Wanstead to Newbury Park, showing the planning, organisation and labour that went into the extension.
